name: Project Cassiopeia
description:
Hey there! I'm Moon, and I am the creator of this game! I'm doing everything independently- with some help from friends! (Music, Character Designs, Sprites, BGs, Writing, Coding, and advertising!)

My pronouns are She/Her, I am 24, and my favorite color is pink!

I wanted to make this otome game because I adore beautiful and well fleshed out games, and I wanted to make the development process completely public because I went into this with no experience making games whatsoever. But thanks to my best friend Willow and my husband having education in game design and coding, I was given the strength to make this dream a reality. It makes me really emotional to see people enjoy my work because doing art and creating loveable characters is one of my biggest passions! 

Project Cassiopeia to me is the entire world. The community I have been able to create because of it, the experiences I have had and will continue to have are things that I will hold very close to my chest always. This game is a love letter to everything I love about otome games and visual novel games, and of romance. 

I cannot express enough how much making this game means to me, and I always strive to make sure everyone who supports me feels seen and noticed. I am blessed with a talented community of wonderful and creative individuals, and if nothing else, I want to inspire everyone to follow their dreams and be who they want to be; no holds barred. 

my main socials are:

twitter: https://www.twitter.com/moonjorasmask

instagram: https://www.instagram.com/moonjorasmask

tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTd77rxxm/

and the official Project Cassiopeia socials are:

twitter: https://www.twitter.com/procassiopeia

instagram: https://www.instagram.com/procassiopeia

Thank you for being here!

Without these special people in my life, this would not be possible. 

My husband, SquishyOctopus (for supporting me no matter what)

SullenWillow (for being a coding genius)

Cataberry (for keeping my head on straight during the long script writing days)

LexyRex (for helping me with my very few typos and giving real time reactions)

And all of my wonderful discord community members! (For reminding me how loved i truly am)
